title: SET_VEHICLE_WHEEL_SIZE
content:
0x53AB5C35// SetVehicleWheelSize
BOOL SET_VEHICLE_WHEEL_SIZE(Vehicle vehicle, float size);Parameters:vehicle: The vehicle to set data for.size: Size of the wheels (usually between 0.5 and 1.5 is reasonable).Returns: Bool - whether change was successful or notSets vehicle's wheels' size (size is the same for all the wheels, cannot get/set specific wheel of vehicle).
Only works on non-default wheels.
Returns whether change was successful (can be false if trying to set size for non-default wheels).
codeBlocks:
// SetVehicleWheelSize
BOOL SET_VEHICLE_WHEEL_SIZE(Vehicle vehicle, float size);

local ped = PlayerPedId()
local vehicle = GetVehiclePedIsIn(ped, false)
-- Example usage for SET_VEHICLE_WHEEL_SIZE
SetVehicleWheelSize(vehicle, 0.0)
